casebody.data:
STATE
v.
George Earl GOODE, Jr. No. 10A94-6. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 11, 2007. Mark Montgomery, Durham, Diane M.B. Savage, for George Earl Goode, Jr. Barry S. McNeill, Special Deputy Attorney General, Susan Doyle, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th day of June 2006 by Defendant to Defer Consideration of Petition for Writ of Certiorari to Permit All Issues Raised in the Court Below to Be Considered in a Single Proceeding:

"Motion Dismissed as Moot by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of October 2007."
